str2: (a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
(lit: an evil-worker), a criminal. From kakos and the base of ergon; a wrong-doer, i.e. Criminal.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to lead; by implication, to bring, drive, go, pass, or induce.
From ana and haireomai; to take up, i.e. Adopt; by implication, to take away, i.e. Abolish, murder.
With. A primary preposition denoting union; with or together.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
